item.title: [LUCENE-1838] BoostingNearQuery must implement clone - now it clones to a NearSpanQuery - cloning is required for Span container classes
item.summary: BoostingNearQuery must implement clone - now it clones to a NearSpanQuery - cloning is required for Span container classes

comments.comment: Technically, SpanQuery should have an abstract clone so that SpanQuerys are required to implement cloneable.
I'm also going to add an optional (default to true) q1.class == q2.class test to the QueryUtils hashCode/equals/clone check.

It looks like its very easy to get into trouble with Querys and cloning. BooleanQuery, DisjunctionQuery have quite a reliance on it - as do the SpanQueries (all in rewrite). Improperly cloning can sometimes have extra special effects with MultiSearcher : LUCENE-1599
